commit.message:
f_back (f/runtime/libI77/backspace.c): use type `uiolen' to determine size of record length specifier.

* f_back (f/runtime/libI77/backspace.c): use type `uiolen'
to determine size of record length specifier.

From-SVN: r17414

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@

+
+	* f_back (f/runtime/libI77/backspace.c): use type `uiolen'
+	to determine size of record length specifier.
